long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- For US employees submitting their timesheet using MYTE -

A super fast and convenient timesheet-filler popup extension!
From the popup:
   [1] - Open your timecard and sign in
   [2] - Open the working hours template
   [3] - Select a Start Time
   [4] - Check the Hours Box
   [5] - Click Apply
Once your timecard is filled in, manually change the hours to reflect your actual time, and Save

You will cutdown the normal time it takes to fill out the timesheet (around 10 minutes) to less than a minute (around 45 seconds)!!!
